name: The majestic game of Knights and Cultists
name_original: The majestic game of Knights and Cultists
description:
Do you like card games? Even better, do you like Losing Terribly at card games?

If so, then this game is for you!

This is a collectible card game where when you lose, you get to edit your deck using cards from your opponent's deck! I think it is pretty fun.

I made The majestic game of knights and cultists in 72 Hours for Wowie Jam 2021. It is by far the most complete game I have made in a Game Jam. It has 27 collectible cards, each with unique art and an associated rarity. It also has 28 playable enemies. I am very proud of myself right now for getting so far into development of this game!

I hope you enjoy!
